name: Tiny War Online
description:
Tiny war online is a gungame type game with a good dose of fun.

You will take on the role of a warrior during a game that has no beginning or end.
The goal is to climb to the top of the leaderboard, for this you must use the different types of weapons that will change during your game.

In addition you will find objects on the map allowing you to trigger bonuses that will help you in your quest for first place

The idea for the project came from seeing these assets => https://zappedcow.itch.io/micro-dungeon-set (I modificate it and still use a 32x32 sprite for all the game)

Controls : 

Move with arrows

Change your weapon direction moving your mouse

Attack with click left
